responsibilities: Solution provider and technical implementer for full stack development of websites or mobile applications.

details.title: Leadership
details.description: Teach or guide interns completed rebuilt the official website, adding new features in other projects, and code review or solution design for them.

details.title: Build License System
details.description: Developed a cloud authentication license system with unified API and database management across different applications, provided UI web for colleagues to generate and edit status of license key.

details.title: Development Mobile Application
details.description: Using React Native and Express.js development an inventory management application that includes barcode or QR code detect and above cloud license.

details.title: Add Extend Function
details.description: Use PHP fpdf library generate invoice pdf file and convert into base64 for response to mobile application(Java) store it and forward the pdf file.

details.title: Development Digital Signature
details.description: Implemented a digital signature website for PDF file, supporting custom size, color, watermark text and position.

details.title: Standardize SQL Queries
details.description: Standardize SQL queries for import data from another accounting system into Microsoft SQL Server.

details.title: Development Website
details.description: Independently built a website based on PHP and jQuery for support team department in work record management and generate PDF reports.

details.title: Development VB Tool
details.description: Using VB6 development a extend tool function that support import excel data into Microsoft SQL Server specify table.
